name: Just Jump (itch) (Unsteady Yeti Games)
description:
Gameplay is king in Just Jump, where even just jumping around will have you smiling from ear to ear and exclaiming "OH SNAP!" Once you get past the simple art style, you'll wonder what you even did with your time before Just Jump existed.

JAM-PACKED with EXHILARATING features, including:

  • Deliciously-dreamy platforming gameplay.
  • 50 fun-filled, limit-pushing levels to rage at.
  • 20+ unique gameplay-altering platforms.
  • Online leaderboards, because comparing yourself to others is important.
  • Speedrunning mode for the ULTRA-XTREME™ gamers out there.
  • Explore the maps at your leisure in search of hidden collectibles.
  • Detailed stat-tracking, so you can keep track of all 10,000 of your deaths.
  • More! More! MORE!

The demo above is limited to 6 of the 50 levels. For the low-low price of $3.99, you can download the full game and access EVERYTHING the game has to offer.  That's less than $0.08 a level! Wait, should I be charging more!? Oh well, too late now, my loss is your gain!

Note: Cookies must be enabled to save your demo progress. There's a known issue with playing the demo in a Firefox browser. Try Chrome or another browser instead. Or just buy and download the game. Then there aren't any issues, just silky-smooth gameplay and hours of fun.
